data.actual_result: You can't scroll all the way down in the info tab, and the poor Wumpus is cut off.
data.expected_result: You can scroll all the way down in the info tab, and when the mutual friends/servers tab is empty, the Wumpus fits in the modal.
data.short_description: Profile tab content not scaling, effect is greatest when the user is playing something. When content is empty, the Wumpus images won't scale and goes out of bounds.
data.steps_to_repro: - Minimize Discord to it's minimum height - search for a user who's playing something (also works with someone who isn't playing anything but the effect is far smaller) - Try to scroll all the way to the bottom in user info. (you can't) - When the mutual servers/mutual friends tab is empty, the poor Wumpus doesn't fit in the box (modal) because he isn't scaled.
